short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will transfer patient ID between Athena and Joints, in no particular order but per hotkey combination.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is built for users who frequently toggle between Medstrat's Joints web application and Athena Healthcare. The key combination is Alt + C
